segments.text: I notice the boy stretching for the cookie jar, and I can’t help but smile at his determination.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool is wobbling, but he’s so focused on those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is right there, waiting for her turn, and it’s kind of cute.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re going to get away with it, too, because the woman is completely oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still running, but it’s like background noise to them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost feel the excitement in the air, like they’re on a secret mission.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so close to the jar, and I’m rooting for him to grab it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the girl will help him balance or just wait for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is chaotic, but in a fun, adventurous way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how serious they look about getting those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
